entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 2:20 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
